mapper.sql: id, ipAddress, className, methodName, parameter, success, sqlContent, tableName, userId, createDate, deleteFlag, moduleName,operationType,operationContent
mapper.select:
SELECT lo.id,lo.ipAddress,lo.className,lo.methodName,lo.parameter,lo.success,lo.sqlContent,lo.tableName, lo.operationType,lo.userId,lo.createDate,lo.deleteFlag,lo.moduleName,lo.operationContent,b.username FROM log_operation lo LEFT JOIN blogger b ON(lo.userId=b.id AND b.deleteFlag=1)
lo.deleteFlag=1
ORDER BY lo.createDate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM log_operation lo LEFT JOIN blogger b ON(lo.userId=b.id AND b.deleteFlag=1)
lo.deleteFlag=1
mapper.update: UPDATE log_operation SET deleteFlag=0 WHERE deleteFlag=1 AND id=#{id}
